channel.title: How do u change the items ppl start out with on pimpscape?

item.title: How do u change the items ppl start out with on pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @java_freek28 java freek28
item.description:
@java_freek28 wrote:

open player.java and search 4:

//Giving the player an unique look u shud c somethin like this:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=Item.randomHat(); playerEquipment[playerCape]=Item.randomCape(); playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=Item.randomAmulet(); playerEquipment[playerChest]=Item.randomBody(); playerEquipment[playerShield]=Item.randomShield(); playerEquipment[playerLegs]=Item.randomLegs(); playerEquipment[playerHands]=Item.randomGloves(); playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Item.randomBoots(); playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing(); playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows(); playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1275; then just change the random to wot u want the item code so say i wanted whip as wep startin i wud put next to playerweapon=4151 hope this helped

Read full topic
